events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but unfortunately one side is not working at all. It seems defective from the start.
The reported problem relates to a product defect with the headphones having a non-working speaker on one side.
An agent has been assigned to handle the defective headphone issue and will respond shortly.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the headphones showing the issue as well as the order number to verify your purchase?
Sure, I have attached pictures showing the damaged side of the headphones and my order ID is 123456789.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement, as I still like the headphones but want to ensure they are fully functional.
We have processed your replacement request, and your new headphones will be shipped within 2 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your replacement headphones arrived and are working properly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting us, and enjoy your new headphones!
